title: HashAttack

content: All the best!I help recover forgotten, lost, lost passwords for =Wallets- wallet.dat,exodus,metamask,electrum,wallet.aes.json,coinomi,blockchain.com(first and second password),etc I also accept password-protected rar and zip archives with forgotten passwords. Seed phrases containing private keys, etc. PersonalI can help you recover your forgotten password as soon as possible.Large server capacity for decrypting hashes 20xRTX4090all methods are involved -a 0, -a 1, -a 3, -a 6, -a 7, prince, rules.I also help to decipher the seed phrase if = Not written correctly! Not enough words! Wrong word placement! Only personal!What do you need to get started with me?1. Indicate the balance of the wallet 2. Collect all your old passwords in a bunch (they are masked, if the password does not pass, dictionaries over 10Tb are used)3. Specify the% that you are ready to give up if the password is successfully found.4. DO NOT ACCEPT = PURCHASED WALLETS = FOUND ON THE INTERNET = IMPORTED WALLET!!!No prepayments, I work according to the result! % is discussed in the PMhttps://ibb.co/C0QVWQ6https://ibb.co/QvYfs11https://ibb.co/V3dQMyJAll questions in telegram= https://t.me/Invisibl777https://t.me/RecoveryServiceWallet

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: I think I might have seen a similar topic like this somewhere on this forum. Can you throw more light on how you intend to do this? Otherwise, this can be considered a scam and a way that you want to use to smuggle money from victims of lost wallet assets. Because I don't believe their are ways of recovering lost wallet assets, and if their would even be any chance of that it will be from the users device which might have create backup some how on the background of the device.

comments.author: HashAttack
comments.body: You probably do not understand a little the whole recovery process ...... The whole point is to recover the password using the wallet hash metadom Via Hashcat. No one loses anything by doing this, as I recover the password using the wallet hash! I don't need access to users' PCs I don't need prepayments I take % for the found password to the hash! All work can go through guarantors!

comments.author: HashAttack
comments.body: A lot of people write with public wallets in the hope of opening them. Stop!!! I don't need to write. It's useless. Public wallets are rubbish.........

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: HashAttack on May 31, 2023, 11:19:06 AMThis is possible if the wallet is personal. And not bought, it is not clear where and it is not clear from whom.Are wallets even completely bought themselves? Because how can one buy a wallet from another person without paying the person, which can't be seen as a complete legal deal? Since wallet phrases and keys can't be changed, the old key will continue to be the right key to the wallet, which the old owner will still have access to. So if you have purchased any wallet from anyone, the person is still likely to move out your assets when they notice a balance change.So I don't think anyone who knows how the blockchain works will actually want to buy any crypto wallet from anyone, no matter who the person turns out to be. Because security is not always guaranteed.
